languages.text: "Тогда планетарный губернатор просто отдал в рекруты все население семнадцати ярусов улья пригодного возраста. Я жил на одном из них. Так я стал солдатом, точнее — штрафником. На нашем полку изначально лежало клеймо позорных деяний, совершенных кем-то из наших погибших предшественников".

"That's when the planet's governor conscripted the entire population of seventeen hive levels, everyone who was of age. I lived on one of those levels. That's how I became a soldier, or to be specific, how I joined a penal legion. Our regiment was branded from the start for some heinous act committed by one of our dead predecessors."
languages.original_text: "Тогда планетарный губернатор просто отдал в рекруты все население семнадцати ярусов улья пригодного возраста. Я жил на одном из них. Так я стал солдатом, точнее — штрафником. На нашем полку изначально лежало клеймо позорных деяний, совершенных кем-то из наших погибших предшественников".

traits.locale_text: "That's when the planet's governor conscripted the entire population of seventeen hive layers, everyone who was of age. I lived on one of those layers. That's how I became a soldier, or to be specific, how I joined a penal legion. Our regiment was branded from the start for some heinous act committed by one of our dead predecessors."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

That's how I became a soldier, or to be specific, how I joined a penal legion. Our regiment was branded from the start for some heinous act committed by one of our dead predecessors."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “于是，那颗行星的总督征召了巢都中十七层的所有人，每位成年人都要入伍。我当时正好住在那里，于是我也应征入伍。确切地说，我成为了判罪军的一员。我们的军团从一开始就被打上了判罪军的烙印，因为军团中某个死了的家伙犯下了令人发指的暴行。”
languages.original_text: "That's when the planet's governor conscripted the entire population of seventeen hive levels, everyone who was of age. I lived on one of those levels. That's how I became a soldier, or to be specific, how I joined a penal legion. Our regiment was branded from the start for some heinous act committed by one of our dead predecessors."

traits.locale_text: “于是，那颗行星的总督征召了巢都中十七层的所有人，每位成年人都要入伍。我当时正好住在那里，于是我也应征入伍。确切地说，我成为了判罪军的一员。我们的军团从一开始就被打上了判罪军的烙印，因为军团中某个死了的家伙犯下了令人发指的暴行。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「その時、惑星の総督が17階層のハイヴのうち、年齢を満たしているすべての者たちを徴兵したのです。私はそのうちのひとつに住んでいました。そうして私は兵士になり、もっと具体的に言うと流刑兵団に入りました。我々の連隊は、死んだ前任者のひとりが犯したある凶悪な行為のせいで、最初から見捨てられる存在としてみなされていました」
languages.original_text: "That's when the planet's governor conscripted the entire population of seventeen hive levels, everyone who was of age. I lived on one of those levels. That's how I became a soldier, or to be specific, how I joined a penal legion. Our regiment was branded from the start for some heinous act committed by one of our dead predecessors."

traits.locale_text: 「その時、惑星の総督が17階層のハイヴのうち、年齢を満たしているすべての者たちを徴兵したのです。私はそのうちのひとつに住んでいました。そうして私は兵士になり、もっと具体的に言うと流刑兵団に入りました。我々の連隊は、死んだ前任者のひとりが犯したある凶悪な行為のせいで、最初から見捨てられる存在としてみなされていました」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Entonces, el gobernador del planeta reclutó a todos los adultos de diecisiete niveles de la colmena al completo. Yo vivía en uno de ellos. Así me convertí en soldado, o, mejor dicho, parte de la legión penal. Nuestro regimiento estuvo marcado desde el principio por algún acto terrible que cometió uno de nuestros antecesores muertos».
languages.original_text: "That's when the planet's governor conscripted the entire population of seventeen hive levels, everyone who was of age. I lived on one of those levels. That's how I became a soldier, or to be specific, how I joined a penal legion. Our regiment was branded from the start for some heinous act committed by one of our dead predecessors."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces, el gobernador del planeta reclutó a todos los adultos de diecisiete niveles de la colmena al completo. Yo vivía en uno de ellos. Así me convertí en soldado, o, mejor dicho, parte de la legión penal. Nuestro regimiento estuvo marcado desde el principio por algún acto terrible que cometió uno de nuestros antecesores muertos».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "That's when the planet's governor conscripted the entire population of seventeen hive levels, everyone who was of age. I lived on one of those levels. That's how I became a soldier, or to be specific, how I joined a penal legion. Our regiment was branded from the start for some heinous act committed by one of our dead predecessors."

languages.text: « Le gouverneur a donc décidé d'enrôler tous ceux qui étaient en âge de se battre sur dix-sept niveaux de la ruche, dont le mien. C'est comme ça que je suis devenu un soldat, ou plus précisément, que j'ai rejoint une légion pénale. Depuis le début, notre régiment était stigmatisé à cause d'un acte odieux commis par l'un de nos prédécesseurs. »
languages.original_text: "That's when the planet's governor conscripted the entire population of seventeen hive levels, everyone who was of age. I lived on one of those levels. That's how I became a soldier, or to be specific, how I joined a penal legion. Our regiment was branded from the start for some heinous act committed by one of our dead predecessors."

traits.locale_text: « Le gouverneur a donc décidé d'enrôler tous ceux qui étaient en âge de se battre sur dix-sept niveaux de la ruche, dont le mien. C'est comme ça que je suis devenu un soldat, ou plus précisément, que j'ai rejoint une légion pénale. Depuis le début, notre régiment était stigmatisé à cause d'un acte odieux commis par l'un de nos prédécesseurs. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Daraufhin zog der Gouverneur des Planeten die gesamte volljährige Bevölkerung von siebzehn Makropolenebenen ein. Ich lebte in einer davon. So wurde ich Soldat, oder genauer, so kam ich zu einer Straflegion. Unser Regiment war von Anfang an verdammt, nur wegen irgendeiner Untat eines unserer toten Vorgänger."
languages.original_text: "That's when the planet's governor conscripted the entire population of seventeen hive levels, everyone who was of age. I lived on one of those levels. That's how I became a soldier, or to be specific, how I joined a penal legion. Our regiment was branded from the start for some heinous act committed by one of our dead predecessors."

traits.locale_text: "Daraufhin zog der Gouverneur des Planeten die gesamte volljährige Bevölkerung von siebzehn Makropolenebenen ein. Ich lebte in einer davon. So wurde ich Soldat, oder genauer, so kam ich zu einer Straflegion. Unser Regiment war von Anfang an verdammt, nur wegen irgendeiner Untat eines unserer toten Vorgänger."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Gezegenin valisi, on yedi kovan seviyesindeki yaşı tutan herkesi askere aldı. Ben de o seviyelerden birinde yaşıyordum. Bu şekilde asker oldum, daha spesifik olmak gerekirse bir ceza infaz lejyonuna katıldım. Alayımız, ölmüş öncüllerimizden birinin işlediği çirkin suçlar nedeniyle en baştan itibaren mimliydi."
languages.original_text: "That's when the planet's governor conscripted the entire population of seventeen hive levels, everyone who was of age. I lived on one of those levels. That's how I became a soldier, or to be specific, how I joined a penal legion. Our regiment was branded from the start for some heinous act committed by one of our dead predecessors."

traits.locale_text: "Gezegenin valisi, on yedi kovan seviyesindeki yaşı tutan tüm nüfuzu askere aldı. Ben de o seviyelerden birinde yaşıyordum. Bu şekilde asker oldum, daha spesifik olmak gerekirse bir cezaî lejyona katıldım. Alayımız, ölmüş öncüllerimizden birinin işlediği çirkin suçlar nedeniyle en baştan itibaren mimliydi."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
